Andrei Homescu

E-mail: ahomescu at uci dot edu

Information

I am a PhD candidate in Computer Science at the University of California Irvine.
I work in the Secure Systems and Software Laboratory, with my advisor Professor Michael Franz.

Publications

  • Stephen Crane, Christopher Liebchen, Andrei Homescu, Lucas Davi, Per Larsen, Ahmad-Reza Sadeghi, Stefan Brunthaler, Michael Franz.
    Readactor: Practical Code Randomization Resilient to Memory Disclosure.
    To appear in Proceedings of the 36th IEEE Symposium on Security and Privacy, Oakland S&P '15, San Jose, CA, May 2015.
  • Stephen Crane, Andrei Homescu, Stefan Brunthaler, Per Larsen, Michael Franz.
    Thwarting Cache Side-Channel Attacks Through Dynamic Software Diversity.
    In Proceedings of the Network and Distributed System Security Symposium, NDSS '15, San Diego, CA, February 2015.
